alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 11:55AM EST until January 15 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Montezuma. .Rainfall amounts of one to two inches across central Indiana yesterday combined with widespread rains of one to two inches earlier in the week will bring elevated river levels to the area, and produce minor lowland flooding along parts of the Wabash River. River flooding could begin on the Wabash at Montezuma this evening and last into early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Montezuma. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Several hundred acres of bottomlands along the right bank from the mouth of Sugar Creek to northern edge of Montezuma begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 14.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued around 300AM EST. late tonight by around 300 AM EST.
